data.name: Label2.Text
data.value:
I) First select your desired option from the home page to either start or load a game or set a desired volume. II) If New Game is selected, begin by entering each players desired name in one of the selected spaces on the left. III) After names are confirmed, you are now now free to start taking turns in the lane to bowl. IV) After you complete your bowl, click on the button corresponding to the amount of pins knocked down that turn. V) If required have your second bowl and return to click on the amout of pins knocked down that turn VI) Allow the next player to have their turn and continue filling out their scores VII) Continue until all 10 frames are filled out to determine the winner
1. A complete game consists of 10 frames. 2. Each player tries to knock down 10 pins in each frame. 3. After the completion of a game with 1-4 players, the final scores will be compared to find a winner 4. You are allowed to bowl 2 balls in each frame. 5. Exceptions: a) If you knock down all the pins on the first ball, you won't need the second b) If you score a strike in the 10th frame, you are entitled to 2 bonus balls. c) If you score a spare in the 10 th frame with the first 2 balls, you get to bowl again. 6. If you knock down all the pins on the first ball, you have scored a STRIKE (indicated with an X) and have scored a bonus for that frame. Your bonus is the number of pins you knock down on the next 2 balls bowled. Your score is 10 (for the strike) plus the bonus pins on the next 2 balls bowled. 7. If you knock down all the pins with 2 balls, you have scored a SPARE (indicated with a /) and earned a bonus for that frame. Your bonus is the number of pins you knock down with the first ball in the next frame. Your score will be 10 (for the spare) plus the bonus pins on the next ball. 8. If you fail to knock down all the pins in a frame, your score is the actual number of pins knocked down.
